name: Cortex Business Solutions
overview:
Cortex provides services for companies to automate and streamline their procure-to-pay (accounts payable) and order-to-cash (accounts receivable) processes. Cortex offers companies of all sizes the ability to reduce operating costs and improve cash flow quickly and effectively. This generates a measurable return on investment for members of the Cortex Trading Partner Network and provides the basis for industry-wide solutions.

We work with buyers and suppliers to help their purchasing and invoicing processes evolve. Cortex eliminates the need for manual paper processing by connecting our customers electronically to our Trading Partner Network. Cortex enables companies to do business with each other easily, efficiently and securely. We focus on improving cash flow and reducing costs, ultimately keeping you in control of your business.

Cortex has a service to fit any business needs. Our services focus on reducing the invoicing cycle time and improving cash flow. Our P2P and O2C Integration services electronically connect your company’s internal business system/s to your suppliers or customers via the Cortex Trading Partner Network; consequently, we eliminate the need for paper processing and chasing down missing documentation.
